data.text:
One day while training, Silence Suzuka seemed 
to be running in good form but-
data.processed:
<story>One day while training, Silence Suzuka seemed 
<story>to be running in good form but-

data.text: Haa… haa… haa… haa…!
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>Haa… haa… haa… haa…!

data.text:
Fuu- an improvement of 0.1 second. Seems like 
there's no issue with running… haa…
data.name: Silence Suzuka

choices.text: Was there a problem with the training…?
choices.processed: <size=40>Was there a problem with the training…?</size>

choices.text: Was there a problem with the training…?
choices.processed: <size=40>Was there a problem with the training…?</size>

data.processed:
<story>Fuu- an improvement of 0.1 second. Seems like 
<story>there's no issue with running… haa…

data.text: Ah, no. There's no issue with the training.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>Ah, no. There's no issue with the training.

data.text: …It's just that, this weekend, there's a Fan Meetup event.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>…It's just that, this weekend, there's a Fan Meetup event.

data.text:
But, I've been so preoccupied with running that…I haven't 
really gotten used to that kind of thing.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>But, I've been so preoccupied with running that…I haven't 
<story>really gotten used to that kind of thing.

data.text:
And last time, when a fan spoke to me, I was so worried thinking 
of a response that I unconsciously started pacing in a circle…
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>And last time, when a fan spoke to me, I was so worried thinking 
<story>of a response that I unconsciously started pacing in a circle…

data.text:
After that, there was an article in a magazine titled "When I 
called out to her, she mysteriously started walking in a 
counterclockwise circle"…
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>After that, there was an article in a magazine titled "When I 
<story>called out to her, she mysteriously started walking in a 
<story>counterclockwise circle"…

data.text:
Because of that, whenever I hear about a "Meetup 
Event" I feel a little dejected… it'd be nice 
if I didn't mess up like that again.
data.name: Silence Suzuka

choices.text: Maybe you were a little overwhelmed

data.processed:
<story>Because of that, whenever I hear about a "Meetup 
<story>Event" I feel a little dejected… it'd be nice 
<story>if I didn't mess up like that again.

data.text: I suppose that could have been the case…
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>I suppose that could have been the case…

data.text:
However, that's exactly why I'd like to conduct the event 
properly. I say that, but, I don't feel like I can…
data.name: Silence Suzuka

choices.text: Want to try practicing with me?
Want to try practicing with me?

data.processed:
<story>However, that's exactly why I'd like to conduct the event 
<story>properly. I say that, but, I don't feel like I can…

data.text: Eh… practice, is it? With Trainer-san…?
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>Eh… practice, is it? With Trainer-san…?

data.text:
And with that, I volunteered to act as a 
Fan to help Silence Suzuka practice.

choices.text:
I've become an even bigger admirer now 
because of your wonderful running!
choices.processed:
<size=21>I've become an even bigger admirer now 
because of your wonderful running!</size>

data.processed:
<story>And with that, I volunteered to act as a 
<story>Fan to help Silence Suzuka practice.

data.text:
Ah… you're starting with an unexpectedly 
higher difficulty subject.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>Ah… you're starting with an unexpectedly 
<story>higher difficulty subject.

data.text:
Um… I should honestly accept the 
praise of "Wonderful Running"…
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>Um… I should honestly accept the 
<story>praise of "Wonderful Running"…

data.text:
"-bigger admirer now" means, in short, up until 
now they've admired me, too… uuuu~n…
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>"-bigger admirer now" means, in short, up until 
<story>now they've admired me, too… uuuu~n…

data.text: …Thank you very much.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>…Thank you very much.

data.text: …Um, that's all.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>…Um, that's all.

data.text:
You don't need to follow up like that. Even if we practice now, 
it'd be just a drop in the bucket.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>You don't need to follow up like that. Even if we practice now, 
<story>it'd be just a drop in the bucket.

data.text:
Unlike Fukikitaru and her fortunes or Taiki who can talk about 
anything, I guess I'm not suited to holding lively conversations.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>Unlike Fukikitaru and her fortunes or Taiki who can talk about 
<story>anything, I guess I'm not suited to holding lively conversations.

data.text:
That said… at the very least, I feel like I should 
do the event with a brighter outlook…
data.name: Silence Suzuka

choices.text: Then should I prepare a reward?

data.processed:
<story>That said… at the very least, I feel like I should 
<story>do the event with a brighter outlook…

data.text: A reward…?
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>A reward…?

data.text:
And then the weekend, the day of the Meetup event 
that worried Silence Suzuka approached.
data.processed:
<story>And then the weekend, the day of the Meetup event 
<story>that worried Silence Suzuka approached.

data.text:
Fuuua… the tension in the air is a bit 
different from a race, isn't it?
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>Fuuua… the tension in the air is a bit 
<story>different from a race, isn't it?

data.text:
Honestly, I'm still a little uneasy but…Yeah. 
I'll stay positive and give it my best.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>Honestly, I'm still a little uneasy but…Yeah. 
<story>I'll stay positive and give it my best.

data.text: Yes. I'll be off…I'll be looking forward to my reward.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>Yes. I'll be off…I'll be looking forward to my reward.

data.text:
Suzuka-san, I always cheer for you! Lately when I see you run, it 
seems like you've got this air of 'completeness' about you!
data.name: Suzuka's Fan
data.processed:
<story>Suzuka-san, I always cheer for you! Lately when I see you run, it 
<story>seems like you've got this air of 'completeness' about you!

data.text: Um, Thank you very much. And… um… mmmm…
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>Um, Thank you very much. And… um… mmmm…

data.text: Ah! Paying attention to such a small detail, I'm honored.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>Ah! Paying attention to such a small detail, I'm honored.

data.text: And, mmmmm… mmmm…
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>And, mmmmm… mmmm…

data.text:
Having seen Silence Suzuka trying her best with 
the event, I went to prepare her reward-
data.processed:
<story>Having seen Silence Suzuka trying her best with 
<story>the event, I went to prepare her reward-

data.text:
The end of the line for a "Royal Honey Carrot Tart" is over 
heeeere! The wait will be at least 140 minutes!
data.name: Store Staff
data.processed:
<story>The end of the line for a "Royal Honey Carrot Tart" is over 
<story>heeeere! The wait will be at least 140 minutes!

data.text:
There was a famous sweets shop in this part of the mall and I 
queued up in the long line. Then-
data.processed:
<story>There was a famous sweets shop in this part of the mall and I 
<story>queued up in the long line. Then-

data.text: 4 hours… you stood in line for that long?
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>4 hours… you stood in line for that long?

data.text:
I see, part of making a Tart is to bake and let 
it cool. That must be why it takes so long…
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>I see, part of making a Tart is to bake and let 
<story>it cool. That must be why it takes so long…

data.text:
Um, I'm sorry. When you suddenly talked about a reward, this was 
the first thing I thought of since it was a hot topic in class…
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>Um, I'm sorry. When you suddenly talked about a reward, this was 
<story>the first thing I thought of since it was a hot topic in class…

data.text: But, because of that, the event went really well.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>But, because of that, the event went really well.

data.text:
Ah… this doesn't mean I've become better at 
interacting with people. It's just…
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>Ah… this doesn't mean I've become better at 
<story>interacting with people. It's just…

data.text: Yes, that's right. At the very least, more so than before.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>Yes, that's right. At the very least, more so than before.

data.text:
Before, I was worried about how to behave or what I should do. I 
thought about alot of things but…
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>Before, I was worried about how to behave or what I should do. I 
<story>thought about alot of things but…

data.text:
Focusing on that "reward" made things simple. 
I just have to do my best, I thought.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>Focusing on that "reward" made things simple. 
<story>I just have to do my best, I thought.

data.text:
Just like in a race, focusing only on the goal… thinking 
like that made it possible.
data.name: Silence Suzuka

choices.text: You worked hard, so the sweets will be delicious
choices.processed: <size=34>You worked hard, so the sweets will be delicious</size>

data.processed:
<story>Just like in a race, focusing only on the goal… thinking 
<story>like that made it possible.

data.text: Fufuu, I'm looking forward to how good they'll be.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>Fufuu, I'm looking forward to how good they'll be.

data.text:
Silence Suzuka said that with a soft expression on her face, full 
of the satisfaction of completing the event.
data.processed:
<story>Silence Suzuka said that with a soft expression on her face, full 
<story>of the satisfaction of completing the event.
